basics.name: Dipti R. Kulkarni
basics.label: Private Credit Analyst at Xander
basics.summary: Investment Analyst in Private Credit. Previously a Robotics and Cloud Engineer. Ex - Rapyuta Robotics and Protegrity. Enthusiastic about learning.

work.name: Institute for Advanced Study, Princeton University
work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

courses: Data Structures and Algorithms, Computer Programming and Problem Solving

awards.title: Aditya Birla Scholarship
awards.summary: The Aditya Birla Scholarship is awarded to students who display academic mettle and extracurricular excellence and have a passion to lead and change the world. She is among 15 students across premier management institutes in the country to have received this aspirational scholarship.

awards.title: Monalisa Gupta Award, IIM Calcutta 59th Annual Convocation Award
awards.summary: Female student who has significant achievements in multiple spheres during her two years of the PGP course of the outgoing batch at IIM Calcutta
